StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_CreateQsnImportTables]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
As
-- CREATE THE TEMP_QSN TABLE IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM DBO.SYSOBJECTS WHERE ID = OBJECT_ID(N'[DBO].[TEMP_QSN]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(ID, N'ISUSERTABLE') = 1) BEGIN PRINT 'PREPARING TO CREATE THE TEMP_QSN TABLE'
--- CREATE TABLE
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TEMP_QSN] ( [FISCAL_YEAR] [int] NULL, [DATEANDTIME] [varchar] (20) NULL, [IMPORTED] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_PIVDATE] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_MOS] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_QSNID] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_RESRUC] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_DISTRICT] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_RS] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_SEX] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_MSC] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_IIADT] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_COMPCODE] [bit] NULL, [QSN] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [IMOS] [nvarchar] (4) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RESRUC] [nvarchar] (5) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [DISTRICT] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RS] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [SEX] [nvarchar] (1) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [IIADT] [nvarchar] (1) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [PIVDATE] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [COMPCODE] [nvarchar] (2) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [MSC_CODE] [nvarchar] (3) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [ASSIGNED_ORG_ID] [int] NULL , [MCC_CODE] [varchar] (3) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION_ID] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
PRINT 'CREATED THE TEMP_QSN TABLE FOR STORING NEW QSNs' END ELSE BEGIN PRINT 'THE TEMP_QSN TABLE ALREADY EXISTS SO WE WILL TRUNCATE IT' DELETE TEMP_QSN END
-- CREATE THE TEMP_BAD_QSN TABLE IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM DBO.SYSOBJECTS WHERE ID = OBJECT_ID(N'[DBO].[TEMP_BAD_QSN]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(ID, N'ISUSERTABLE') = 1) BEGIN PRINT 'PREPARING TO CREATE THE TEMP_BAD_QSN TABLE'
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TEMP_BAD_QSN] ( [FISCAL_YEAR] [int] NULL, [DATEANDTIME] [varchar] (20) NULL, [IMPORTED] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_PIVDATE] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_MOS] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_QSNID] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_RESRUC] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_DISTRICT] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_RS] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_SEX] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_MSC] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_IIADT] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_COMPCODE] [bit] NULL, [QSN] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [IMOS] [nvarchar] (4) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RESRUC] [nvarchar] (5) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [DISTRICT] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RS] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [SEX] [nvarchar] (1) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [IIADT] [nvarchar] (1) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [PIVDATE] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [COMPCODE] [nvarchar] (2) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [MSC_CODE] [nvarchar] (3) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [ASSIGNED_ORG_ID] [int] NULL , [MCC_CODE] [varchar] (3) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION_ID] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
PRINT 'CREATED THE TEMP_BAD_QSN TABLE FOR STORING NEW QSNs' END ELSE BEGIN PRINT 'THE TEMP_BAD_QSN TABLE ALREADY EXISTS SO WE WILL TRUNCATE IT' DELETE TEMP_BAD_QSN END
-- CREATE THE READY_TO_IMPORT_QSN TABLE IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM DBO.SYSOBJECTS WHERE ID = OBJECT_ID(N'[DBO].[READY_TO_IMPORT_QSN]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(ID, N'ISUSERTABLE') = 1)
BEGIN PRINT 'PREPARING TO CREATE THE READY_TO_IMPORT_QSN TABLE'
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[READY_TO_IMPORT_QSN] ( [FISCAL_YEAR] [int] NULL, [DATEANDTIME] [varchar] (20) NULL, [IMPORTED] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_PIVDATE] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_MOS] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_QSNID] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_RESRUC] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_DISTRICT] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_RS] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_SEX] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_MSC] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_IIADT] [bit] NULL, [ERROR_COMPCODE] [bit] NULL, [QSN] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [IMOS] [nvarchar] (4) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RESRUC] [nvarchar] (5) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [DISTRICT] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RS] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [SEX] [nvarchar] (1) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [IIADT] [nvarchar] (1) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [PIVDATE] [nvarchar] (9) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [COMPCODE] [nvarchar] (2) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [MSC_CODE] [nvarchar] (3) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [ASSIGNED_ORG_ID] [int] NULL , [MCC_CODE] [varchar] (3) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION_ID] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
PRINT 'CREATED THE READY_TO_IMPORT_QSN TABLE FOR STORING NEW QSNs' END ELSE BEGIN PRINT 'THE READY_TO_IMPORT_QSN TABLE ALREADY EXISTS SO WE WILL TRUNCATE IT'
END
